title: Integrative medicine
description: What is integrative medicine? Find out more about an evidence-based, healing-oriented approach for your condition from experts at HonorHealth.
cleaned_text: medicine? If you are living with chronic health issues that aren't easily managed by conventional treatments and medication, you may want to consider integrative medicine. Integrative medicine is an evidence-based, healing-oriented approach that combines conventional medicine and complementary therapies to promote health and wellness, and looks at all aspects of your life. What is lifestyle medicine? Lifestyle medicine overlaps with integrative medicine in some areas. It includes the use of evidence-based lifestyle therapeutic intervention to change personal habits and behaviors to optimize health and prevent, treat or reverse the chronic diseases of our time. Research has shown that 80% of chronic diseases can be addressed with lifestyle medicine.
